sqlQuery.name: ProjectId
sqlQuery.sql: select * from (SELECT distinct project_id as internal, project_id as term, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as display FROM @REMOTE_METRICS_SCHEMA@.SEARCHESSTATS) ORDER BY display

sqlQuery.name: ProjectIdNoAll
sqlQuery.sql: select * from (SELECT distinct project_id as internal, project_id as term, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as display FROM @REMOTE_METRICS_SCHEMA@.ORGANISMVIEWSTATS) ORDER BY display

sqlQuery.name: ProjectIdNoPortal
sqlQuery.sql: select * from (SELECT distinct project_id as internal, project_id as term, CASE when project_id in ('EuPathDB') then 'VEuPathDB' else project_id end as display FROM @REMOTE_METRICS_SCHEMA@.GENEPAGETABLESTATS WHERE project_id is not null) ORDER BY display
